content:
The new tennis facility at Keswick Hall features seven fully refurbished, distinctive courts designed for year-round play.

Two of the courts feature an all-weather Claytech European Red Clay, a hybrid surface that combines a hard court with the beauty and playability of a clay court.

The other five courts have all been converted to red clay, bringing the first European sub-irrigated red clay courts to the Mid-Atlantic region.  A state-of-the-art HyQ sub-irrigation system provides the most consistent clay court experience, while using less water.

A technologically advanced LED lighting system enables play well into the evening hours. Keswick’s top notch tennis pros are available for private tennis lessons, group classes and organized corporate events, for an additional cost. Tennis amenities such as court reservations, tennis rackets, tennis balls and usage of the facility’s ball machine are included in the hotel’s resort fee.
